page.title: 06SPORT IN S.HARRIS
page.content: {TENNIS}_Our scool has its own tarmacadam tennis court.We do not use it in the winter though it is used often in the summer. {ANGLING }_One of the best places I know is Loch Steisevat where you can catch quite good sized fish.One year my friend Angus Alec caught a 4 pound kelt.The Mill pool is used by anglers who come on holiday to Rodel Hotel. In front of Dunmore Crescent is a small pier and that is good as well. Unfortunately there is no fishing club in Leverburgh so we go individually. {CLAY PIGEON}_In Seilebost every year there is clay pigeon shooting.They catapult clay discs up into the air and shoot them with double barrel shot_guns. {GOLF}_ plans are underway to start up a golf course in Scarista.
